item.title: Need help on how to make a master command
item.dc:creator: @Hockey4lifexx Hockey4lifexx
item.description:
@Hockey4lifexx wrote:

ffs, how hard is it:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("master") && playerRights >= 1) { addSkillXP(30000000, 0); addSkillXP(30000000, 1); addSkillXP(30000000, 2); addSkillXP(30000000, 3); addSkillXP(30000000, 4); addSkillXP(30000000, 5); addSkillXP(30000000, 6); addSkillXP(30000000, 7); addSkillXP(30000000, 8); addSkillXP(30000000, 9); addSkillXP(30000000, 10); addSkillXP(30000000, 11); addSkillXP(30000000, 12); addSkillXP(30000000, 13); addSkillXP(30000000, 14); addSkillXP(30000000, 15); addSkillXP(30000000, 16); addSkillXP(30000000, 17); addSkillXP(30000000, 18); addSkillXP(30000000, 19); addSkillXP(30000000, 20); addSkillXP(30000000, 21); addSkillXP(30000000, 22); addSkillXP(30000000, 23); sendMessage(""+ playerName +" .. your a nerd."); }

dont ask where to put it, if u dont kno then DONT make a server!

Read full topic
